allIssues.title: English Language Toggle
allIssues.description: The 'English' language toggle is in English, even when the app is presumably intended to be in Arabic.
allIssues.suggestion: This should also be localized and replaced with Arabic text: 'إنجليزي'. It's a toggle, so both should appear as needed

allIssues.title: English text in RTL context.
allIssues.description: The 'English' text on the top right corner of the screen is in English instead of Arabic. Since the app is likely Arabic and the user has selected Arabic as the primary language, this should be translated.
allIssues.suggestion: Replace 'English' with its Arabic translation 'الإنجليزية'

allIssues.title: English language option misaligned.
allIssues.description: The "English" language option is aligned to the left, while the standard is to have it on the right.
allIssues.suggestion: Align the "English" language option to the right of the screen.

allIssues.title: Icon placement
allIssues.description: The icon next to "تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة" appears on the left of the text. Since this is an RTL app, it should be on the right.
allIssues.suggestion: Reverse the order of icon and text.

allIssues.title: "English" text not RTL
allIssues.description: The 'English' button (language selector) does not visually indicate RTL layout and the label is English when it should be Arabic. It should be displaying the Arabic word for English, and reflect RTL alignment.
allIssues.suggestion: Localize the text and adjust RTL alignment.

allIssues.title: Spacing issue
allIssues.description: The "تسجيل الدخول / إنشاء حساب" and "تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة" button should have a larger spacing between them. They appear to be too close to each other.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the spacing between the buttons using margins.

allIssues.title: Animation label is not localized.
allIssues.description: The label 'Animation' below the loading indicator is not localized to Arabic. This creates a jarring experience for Arabic-speaking users.
allIssues.suggestion: Translate the 'Animation' label to Arabic.

allIssues.title: Text alignment issue.
allIssues.description:
The text "أسهل طريقة لإدارة دعواتك وتنظيم مناسباتك
الخاصة" is not perfectly aligned in the center.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust text alignment to be perfectly center.

allIssues.title: English language button
allIssues.description: The button labeled 'English' is intended for changing the language. The positioning is incorrect for RTL languages.
allIssues.suggestion: The English button with the globe icon should be aligned to the left side of the screen, for a RTL language.

allIssues.title: Button labels should be RTL
allIssues.description: The labels on the buttons, such as "تسجيل الدخول / إنشاء حساب" and "تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة", appear to be formatted correctly for RTL, but need to verify it by dynamic testing when interacting with the app.
allIssues.suggestion: Confirm proper RTL text rendering and alignment by testing the app.

allIssues.title: Check RTL alignment for all text
allIssues.description: Need to verify that all text content, including labels and descriptions, is rendered correctly with RTL alignment when interacting with the app.
allIssues.suggestion: Ensure that all text elements are set to "text-align: right" and that the direction attribute is set to "rtl" on the appropriate elements.

allIssues.title: English language button alignment
allIssues.description: When 'English' language is selected, the button is aligned to left.
allIssues.suggestion: Change the alignment to right when 'English' is selected.

allIssues.title: English language selector alignment
allIssues.description: The language selector 'English' is aligned to the left. In an RTL context, it should be aligned to the right.
allIssues.suggestion: Align the language selector to the right.

allIssues.title: Icon alignment for RTL
allIssues.description: The suitcase icon next to 'تسجيل الدخول كمزود خدمة' should be on the right side of the text in an RTL layout.
allIssues.suggestion: Flip the icon to the right side of the text.

allIssues.title: Inconsistent text size
allIssues.description: The text size for the title and the description is not the same.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust the text sizes for better readability and visual hierarchy.

allIssues.title: Incorrect spacing
allIssues.description: Inconsistent spacing of 'تسجيل الدخول / إنشاء حساب' button, should be slightly increased between top and bottom
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust the spacing of the button elements for better visual appeal.

allIssues.title: Animation Label
allIssues.description: The text 'Animation' is in English, even when the app is intended to be in Arabic.
allIssues.suggestion: This should also be localized and replaced with Arabic text.

allIssues.title: Slightly misaligned "Animation" text
allIssues.description: The "Animation" text seems slightly misaligned relative to the animation icon above it. Not perfectly centered visually.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust the horizontal alignment to center it properly.

allIssues.title: Spacing inconsistency
allIssues.description: Spacing between the title "دعوتي" and description is tighter than between the description and the buttons.
allIssues.suggestion: Standardize vertical spacing for visual consistency.

allIssues.title: Animation indicator placement
allIssues.description: The 'Animation' text is too close to the loading indicator, making it slightly hard to read.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the spacing between the indicator and text for better readability.

allIssues.title: Animation label visibility
allIssues.description: The animation label could be more visible.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase contrast or add a background.

allIssues.title: Minor Spacing issue
allIssues.description: There is some extra spacing present after the logo and before the main heading
allIssues.suggestion: Reduce the spacing to make the UI look more appealing

allIssues.title: Version information positioning
allIssues.description: The version information "v1.0.0" looks too close to the top edge of the screen.
allIssues.suggestion: Add some top padding to give it more visual space.

allIssues.title: Animation loading indicator is unclear
allIssues.description: The loading indicator above the logo isn't clear. It's a subtle circle that doesn't give a clear sense of loading progression.
allIssues.suggestion: Use a more prominent and standard loading indicator (e.g., a spinner, progress bar) to indicate the loading state.

allIssues.title: Animation Loading indicator
allIssues.description: Loading indicator near the logo, unclear if it's stuck or working.
allIssues.suggestion: Ensure the animation loading indicator is working correctly and loading relevant content.

allIssues.title: Animation label needs translation
allIssues.description: The label 'Animation' above the logo is not translated to Arabic.
allIssues.suggestion: Translate the label to Arabic, e.g., 'الرسوم المتحركة'.

allIssues.title: Inconsistent spacing
allIssues.description: Spacing between elements, especially above and below the logo, feels a bit uneven.
allIssues.suggestion: Adjust spacing for better visual balance and consistency.

allIssues.title: Touch target size
allIssues.description: The language selection button may be too small to be easily tapped, especially on smaller screens.
allIssues.suggestion: Increase the touch target area for the language selection button.

allIssues.title: Missing animation
allIssues.description: The 'Animation' label is present but animation is not seen or functional
allIssues.suggestion: Implement animation. If not possible, remove the label.

analysisResults.summary: The screen appears to be well-designed with a clean and minimalist aesthetic. The central logo and text are well-placed, and the color scheme is visually appealing. However, there is no English text visible. The screen is Arabic and seems complete, meaning there are no missing elements or states that could be judged. The direction of writing in Arabic can only be fully evaluated for issues of writing direction when a form with textboxes is included in the analysis.

analysisResults.summary: The screenshot displays a well-designed welcome/login screen for a mobile app. The UI is clean and intuitive. The RTL layout seems to be implemented correctly. No functional, performance, or accessibility issues are apparent from the static image. The overall design quality is high.
The screenshot shows the initial screen of the Dawati app in Arabic. The overall layout looks good, and there are no immediately apparent critical issues.
